title: How to Build a Primitive Shelter
content: Debris Hut: Pile leaves, grass, and sticks over a ridgepole (long stick supported on one end). Crawl inside and line it with insulation. Lean-To: Rest a long branch against a tree or rock. Lean branches and cover with leaves or a tarp. Wickiup: Create a cone frame of long sticks, cover with bark, grass, or hide. Good for cold weather.
